name: TIME TO READ A GUN
description:
Time to Read a Gun is a game where you have 3 options 

- Use the clock

- Shoot

- Read

But these options can be a little tricky!  

Get the Highest Score you can in this "fake rouguelike" and live an insane experience!!!

*NOTE: THERE'S A PART WITH SOME ROTATING FANS THAT THE GAME FPS FALLS DRASTICALLY, UNFORTUNATELLY I WASN'T ABLE TO CORRECT IT DUE TO THE TIME, I JUST REALIZED THE ERROR WAY TOO LATE*
